title: RP charge
body: So I just bought an American Express gift card for $100 and I'm trying to buy $100 worth of RP but every time it says that the purchase was denied is there a charge on buying RP or other charge that I'm not being told please help I just want RP.

replies.body: Also when it says I have exceeded the amount of attempts at an RP purchase please wait 24 hours is that saying wait 24 from the first time or every subsequent time I try after the first.

You'll have to wait 24 hours before even trying again, but be sure you've [fully registered and set up the card](https://www.americanexpress.com/serve/cash-back-prepaid-card) prior to attempting another purchase.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
